actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Fossil and Synthetic Fuels.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Fossil and Synthetic Fuels

official_title: A bill to amend the Natural Gas Act to provide that any new authorization to import natural gas may be granted only if domestically-produced natural gas is not available at a lower price.

summary.text: Amends the Natural Gas Act to provide that an authorization for the importation of natural gas produced outside of the United States shall not be in the public interest for any period unless adequate volumes of domestically produced natural gas are not available at a price below that of the imported gas.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Natural Gas Act to provide that any new authorization to import natural gas may be granted only if domestically-produced natural gas is not available at a lower price.
